TCD223.Transcription: Who so hon thys do lokeshalle ffynde me yn thys boke
TCD223.Note:
Scribbled in margin, followed by name, ‘John Lawmlay sum tyme in
                    thys hows off westderan’ (f. 38).
TCD223.Editions:
Colker,  Marvin L.,
                        ed.  
             Trinity College Library, Dublin: Descriptive catalogue of the Mediaeval
                and Renaissance Latin Manuscripts.
         Aldershot, Hants.: Scolar Press, 1991: 1.417.
